verses.padam: - Padam cAtvAlAt|dhiṣṇi̍yAn|upEti̍|vapati|yOni̍ḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|cAtvA̍lam|yajñasya̍|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|dEvAḥ|vai|yajñam|parEti̍|ajayanta|tam|AgnI̱̱ddhrAdityAgni̍# - iddhrAt|punaḥ|apEti̍|ajayann|Etat|vai|yajñasya̍|apa̍rAjitamityapa̍rA̍ - jitam|yat|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni# - iddhram|yat|AgnI̱ddhrAdityAgni# - iddhrAt|dhiṣṇiyAn|viharatIti̍# vi-harati|yat|Eva|yajñasya̍|apa̍rAjitamityapa̍rA̍ - jitam|tataḥ|Eva|Enam|puna̍ḥ|tanutE|parAjityEti̍# parA-jitya|iva|Kalu̍|vai|EtE|yanti|yE|bahiṣpavamAnamiti̍# bahiḥ - pavamAnam|sarpanti|bahiṣpavamAna̍ iti# bahiḥ - pavamAnE|stutE|1 (50)
verses.samhita: cAtvAlAd-dhiṣṇi̍yAnupa̍# vapati yOnirvai yajñasya cAtvAlaM̍ ~Myajñasya# sayOnitvAya# dEvA vai yajñaM parA&jayanta̍ tamAgnI̱ddhrAt punarapAjayannEtadvai̍ yajñasyA-parAjitaM̍ ~MyadAgnI̱ddhraM ~MyadAgnI̱ddhrAddhiṣṇiyAn.̍ viharati̍ yadEva yajñasyA-parAjitaM̍ tata# EvainaM punastanutE̍ parAjityEva̍ Kalu vA EtE yanti̍ yE bahiṣpavamAnaṃ̍ sarpanti̍ bahiṣpavamAnE stuta- [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|agnIdityagni# - it|agnIn|vIti|hara|baraḥiḥ|stRuṇAhi|purOḍAśAn̍|ala̱m|kuru|iti̍|yajñam|Eva|apajityEtya̍pa-jitya̍|puna̍ḥ|tanvAnAḥ|yanti|a~ggA̍raiḥ|dvE̍ iti|sava̍nE̍ iti|vIti̍|harati|śalAkA̍Biḥ|tRutIya̱m|saśukratvAyEti̍# saśukra - tvAya|athO̍ iti|samiti̍|Barati|Eva|Enat|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|vai|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|sOma̱m|arakṣann|tEBya̍ḥ|adhIti̍|sOma̱m|Eti̍|aharann|tam|anvavAyannitya̍nu-avAyann̍|tam|parIti̍|aviśann|ya|Evam|vEda̍|vindatE̱|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AhAgnIdagnIn.̍ vi hara̍ barqḥiḥ stRuṇAhi̍ purOḍAśAṃq alaM̍ kurviti# yajñamEvApajitya punastanvAnA̍ yantya~ggArairdvE̍ savanE̍ vi harati̍ śalAkABi-stRutIyaṃ̍# saśukratvAyAthO saM BaratyEvainaddhiṣṇi̍yA̍ vA amuṣmin̍ ~MlOkE sOmamarakṣan̍ tEByO&dhi sOmamA&haran̍ ta manvavAyantaM̍ paryaviśanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# vindatE-̍ [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam parivEṣṭAramiti# pari - vEṣṭAra̱m|tE|sOmapIthEnEti# sOma - pIthEna|vIti̍|Ad^^rdhyanta|tE|dEvEṣu̍|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|aicCanta|tAn|dEvAḥ|abruvann|dvE dvE iti dvE-dvE|nAmanI̍ iti|kuruddhvam|atha̍|prEti̍|vA|APsyatha̍|na|vA|iti̍|agnaya̍ḥ|vai|atha̍|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|tasmA̱t|dvinAmEti̍# dvi - nAmA̱|brAhmaṇaḥ|ad^^rdhukaḥ|tEṣA̱m|yE|nEdi̍ṣṭham|paryavi̍śaniti̍# pari - aviśann|tE|sOmapIthamiti̍# sOma - pItham|prEti|Apnuvann|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|AgnIddhrIya̍ ityA̱gni - idhrIyaḥ|hOtrIya̍ḥ|mArjAlIya̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|tEṣu̍|juhvati|atihAyEtya̍ti-hAya̍|vaṣa̍ṭ|karOti|vIti̍|hi|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: parivEṣṭAraM tE sOmapIthEna̍ vyA̱rddhyanta tE dEvEṣu# sOmapIthamai̱cCanta tAn dEvA abruvan̍ dvEdvE nAmanI̍ kuruddhvamatha pra vA&&Psyatha na vEtyagnayO vA atha dhiṣṇiyAstasmA̱d̍ dvinAmA̱ brAhmaṇO&rddhukastEṣAM̍ ~MyE nEdiṣṭhaM̍ paryaviśan̍ tE sOmapIthaM̍ prA&*pnuvannAhavanIya̍# AgnIddhrIyO# hOtrIyO# mArjAlIyastasmAt tEṣu# juhvatyatihAya vaṣaṭ̍ karOti vi hyE-̍ [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam EtE|sOmapIthEnEti# sOma - pIthEna|Ad^^rdhya̍nta|dEvAḥ|vai|yAḥ|prAcI̱ḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|ajuhavuḥ|yE|purastA̱t|asu̍rAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|prEti̍|anudanta|yAḥ|pratIcI̱ḥ|yE|paścAt|asu̍rAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|apEti̍|anudanta|prAcI̱ḥ|anyAḥ|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|hUyantE̱|pratya~g|AsInaḥ|dhiṣṇi̍yAn|vyAGA̍rayatIti̍# vi - AGArayati|paścAt|ca|Eva|purastA̱t|ca|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|tasmA̱t|parA̍cIḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|prEti|vIyantE|pratIcI̱ḥ|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tE sOmapIthEnA&&*rddhya̍nta̍ dEvA vai yAḥ prAcI-rAhutI-raju̍havuryE̍ purastAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅ stABiḥ prAṇudanta̍ yAḥ pratIcIryE paścAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅstABi-rapAnudanta̍ prAcIranyA̍ AhutayO̍ hUyantE̱ pratya~g~gAsInO̍ dhiṣṇiyAn.̍ vyAGArayati̍ paścAccaiva purastA̱cca yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudatE̍ tasmAt parAcIḥ̍ prajAḥ pra vIyantE̍ pratIcI̱- [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam jAyantE|prAṇA iti# pra-anAḥ|vai|EtE|yat|dhiṣṇiyAḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|pratya~g|dhiṣṇi̍yAn|atisarpEditya̍ti̍ - sarpE̱t|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|samiti|karq.ṣEt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|nABi̍ḥ|vai|EṣA|yajñasya̍|yat|hOtA̱|Ud^^rdhvaḥ|Kalu̍|vai|nAByai̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|avA~g|apAna̍ ityapa̍ - anaḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|pratya~g|hOtAram|atisarpEditya̍ti̍ - sarpE̱t|apAna ityapa̍ - anE|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|daddhyAt|pramAyuka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|na|addhvaryuḥ|upEti̍|gAyEt|vAgvI̱rya̍ iti vAk - vIryaḥ|vai|addhvaryuḥ|yat|addhvaryuḥ|upagAyEdityupa̍ - gAyE̱t|udgAtra ityut̍ - gAtrE|5 (50)
verses.samhita: rjAyantE prAṇA vA EtE yaddhiṣṇiyA̍ yadaddhvaryuḥ̍ pratya~g dhiṣṇiyA-natisarpE̱t̍ prAṇAnth saMkaṛṣEt̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAnnABirvA EṣA yajñasya yaddhOtOrddhvaḥ Kalu vai nAByai̱ prAṇO&vA~gapAnO̍ yadadhvaryuḥ̍ pratya~g hOtAramatisarpE̍dapAnE̍ prAṇaM dadhyAt̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAnnAddhvaryurupa# gAyEd vAgvI̱ryO vA addhvaryu-ryada̍ddhvaryuru̍pa-gAyE̍dud-gAtrE-̍ [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam vAca̱m|sam|prEti|yacCEt|upadAsukEtyu̍pa-dAsu̍kA|asya|vAk|syAt|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|na|asaṅ̍sthita̍ ityasa̱M - sthitE|sOmE̱|addhvaryuḥ|pratya~g|sadaḥ|atIti̍|iyAt|atha̍|kathA|dAkṣiṇAni̍|hOtu̱m|Eti|yAma̍ḥ|hi|saḥ|tEṣA̱m|kasmai̱|aha̍|dEvAḥ|yAma̱m|vA|ayA̍mam|vA|anviti̍|jñAsyanti|iti̍|utta̍rEṇEtyut-̍ tarEṇa|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni# - iddhram|parItyEti# pari - itya|juhOti|dAkṣiṇAni̍|na|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|samiti|karq.ṣati|nIti̍|anyE|dhiṣṇi̍yAḥ|upyantE̱̍ ( )|na|anyE|yAn|nivapatIti# ni - vapati|tEna̍|tAn|prIṇAti|yAn|na|nivapatIti̍# ni - vapati|yat|anudiśatItya̍nu̍ - diśati|tEna̍|tAn||6̍ (64)
verses.samhita: vAcaṃq saM pra yacCE-dupadAsu̍kA&sya̍ vAK syA̱dbrahmavAdinO# vadanti nAsaṅsthitE̍ sOmE̱&ddhvaryuḥ pratya~gK sadO&tIyAdatha̍# kathA dA̱kṣiṇAni hOtumEti̍ yAmO hi sa tEṣAM kasmA aha# dEvA yAmaM ~MvA&yAmaM̍ ~MvA&nu# jñAsyantItyu-ttarEṇA&&*gnI̱ddhraM̍ parItya# juhOti dAkṣiṇAni na prAṇAnthsaM kaṛṣati̍ nyanyE̍ dhiṣṇiyA̍ upyantE ( ) nAnyE yAn nivapati̍ tEna tAn prIṇAti̍ yAn nanivapati̍ yadanudiśati̍ tEna tAn||6

verses.padam: - Padam suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|EtAni̍|lOkAya̍|hUyantE|yat|vaisarjanAni̍|dvAByA̱m|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyE|juhOti|dvipAditi# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni-iddhrE|juhOti|antari̍kṣE|Eva|Eti̍|kramatE|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|juhOti|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|dEvAn|vai|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yataḥ|rakṣAṃsi|ajiGAṃqsann|tE|sOmE̍na|rAjñA̱|rakṣAṃ̍si|apahatyEtya̍pa̍ - hatya|aptum|AtmAna̱m|kRutvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|rakṣasAm|anu̍palABAyEtyanu̍pa̍ - lABAya|Attaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|Bavati|atha̍|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargAya vA EtAni# lOkAya# hUyantE yad vaisarjanAni̍ dvAByAM gAṛhapatyE̍ juhOti dvipAd yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ AgnI̱ddhrE juhOtyantarikṣa̍ EvA&&*kramata̍ AhavanIyE# juhOti suvargamEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ dEvAn. vai suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyatO rakṣAṅsya̍ jiGAṃsantE sOmEna̍ rAjñA rakṣAṅ-syapahatyAptu-mAtmAna̍M̍ kRutvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ rakṣasA-manu̍palABAyA̍ &&*ttaḥ sOmO# Bavatyatha-̍ [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam vaisarjanAni|juhOti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|tvam|sOma|tanUkRudBya iti# tanUkRut - Byaḥ|iti|Aha|tanUkRuditi̍# tanU - kRut|hi|Eṣaḥ|dvEṣO̱Bya iti dvEṣaḥ̍ - Byaḥ|anyakRutEBya̍ ityanya - kRutEByaḥ|iti|Aha|anyakRu̍tAnItyanya̍ - kRutAni|hi|rakṣAṃsi|uru|yantA|asi|varU̍tham|iti̍|Aha|uru|naḥ|kRudhi|iti̍|vAva|Etat|Aha|juṣAṇaḥ|aptuḥ|Ajya̍sya|vEtu|iti̍|Aha|aptum|Eva|yaja̍mAnam|kRutvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|rakṣasAm|anu̍palABAyEtyanu̍pa̍ - lABAya|Eti|sOma̱m|dadatE|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaisarjanAni# juhOti rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ tvaṃ sOma̍ tanUkRudBya ityAha̍ tanUkRuddhyaṣa̍ dvEṣO̱ByO&nyakRutEBya̍ ityAhAnyakRu̍tAni̍ hi rakṣAṅsyuru̍ yantA&si varUthamityA̍hOru̍ ṇaskRudhIti̍ vAvaitadAha̍ juṣAṇO apturAjyasya̍ vEtvityAhAptumEva̍ yajamAnaM̍ kRutvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ rakṣasA-manu̍palABAyA&&*̍ sOmaM̍ dadata- [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|grAv^^ṇṇa̍ḥ|Eti̍|vAyavyA̍ni|Eti̍|drOṇakalaśamiti̍# drOṇa - kalaśam|uditi|patnI̱m|Eti̍|nayanti|anviti̍|anAṃ̍si|prEti̍|vartayanti|yAva̍t|Eva|asya|asti̍|tEna̍|saha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|nayavatyEti̍ naya# - vatyA|RucA|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|juhOti|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBinI̱tyA̍ ityaBi-nItyai|grAv^^ṇṇaḥ|vAyavyA̍ni|drOṇakalaśamiti̍# drOṇa-kalaśam|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|upEti|vAsayati|vIti̍|hi|Enam|taiḥ|gRuhṇatE̱|yat|saha|upavAsayEdityu̍pa̍ - vAsayE̱t|apuvAyEta|saumya|RucA|prEti̍|pAdayati|svayA̱|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A grAvṇṇa A vAyavyA̱nyA̍ drOṇakalaśamut̍ patnImA nayantyanvanAṃ̍si̍ pra vartayanti̍ yAvadEvAsyAsti̍ tEna# saha suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ nayavatyarcA&&gnI̱ddhrE̍ juhOti suvargasya# lOkasyABinI̱tyai grAvṇṇO# vAyavyAni̍ drOṇakalaśamAgnI̱ddhra upa# vAsayati vi hyEnaM̍ tairgRuhṇatE yath sahOpavAsayE̍-dapuvAyEta̍# saumyarcA pra pAdayati̍ svayai- [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|dEvatayA|prEti̍|pAdayati|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|sIda|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|yajamAnaḥ|vai|Etasya̍|purA|gOptA|Bavati|Eṣaḥ|vaḥ|dEva|savitaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu-prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|sam|prEti|yacCati|Etat|tvam|sOma|dEvaḥ|dEvAn|upEti̍|agAḥ|iti̍|Aha|dEvaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|sann|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -vainaM̍ dEvatayA̍ pra pAdayatyadi̍tyAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A sIdEtyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitad-yajamAnO̍ vA Etasya# purA gOptA BavatyEṣa̍ vO# dEva savitaḥ sOma ityAha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainaM̍ dEvatA̱Byaḥ saM prayacCatyEtat̍ tvaṃ sOma̍ dEvO dEvAnupAgA̍ ityAha̍ dEvO hyEṣa̍ san- [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAn|upaitItyupa̍ - Eti|idam|aham|manuṣya̍ḥ|manuṣyAn̍|iti̍|Aha|manuṣya̍ḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|sann|manuṣyAn̍|upaitItyu̍pa̍ - Eti|yat|Etat|yaju̍ḥ|na|brUyAt|apra̍jA̍ ityapra# - jAḥ|apaśuḥ|yajamAnaḥ|syAt|saha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saha|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|iti̍|Aha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|paśuBiriti# paśu-Biḥ|saha|imam|lOkam|upAvartata̍ ityupa̍ - AvartatE|nama̍ḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|namaskAra̍ iti# namaḥ - kAraḥ|hi|dEvAnA̱m|svadhEti# sva - dhA|pitRuBya iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|iti|Aha|svadhAkAra̍ iti# svadhA - kAraḥ|hi|11 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAnupaitIdamahaM manuṣyO̍# manuṣyAnityA̍ha̍ manuṣyO̱(1q) hyEṣa̍ san manuṣyA̍nupaiti̍ yadEtad yajurna brUyAdaprajA̍ apaśuryajamAnaḥ̍ syAth saha prajayA# saha rAyaspOṣEṇEtyAha̍ prajayaiva paśuBiḥ̍ sahEmaM ~MlOkamupAvartatE̍ namO# dEvEBya ityAha̍ namaskArO hi dEvAnAṅ# svadhA pitRuBya ityAha̍ svadhAkArO hi- [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam pitRuṇAm|idam|aham|niriti|varu̍ṇasya|pAśA̱t|iti̍|Aha|varuṇapAśAditi̍# varuṇa - pAśAt|Eva|niriti|mucyatE|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|Atmanaḥ|pUrvA̱|tanUḥ|AdEyEtyA̱̍ - dEyA̱|iti|Ahuḥ|kaḥ|hi|tat|vEda̍|yat|vasI̍yAn|svE|vaśE̱|BUtE|puna̍ḥ|vA|dadA̍ti|na|vA|iti̍|grAvA̍ṇaḥ|vai|sOma̍sya|rAjña̍ḥ|malimlusEnEti̍# malimlu - sEnA|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|grAv^^ṇṇaḥ|AgnI̱ddhra̍ ityAgni# - iddhrE|upavAsayatItyupa̍ - vAsayati|na|Enam|malimlusEnEti̍# malimlu - sEnA|vindati ( )||12 (50)
verses.samhita: pitRuṇAmidamahaM̍ nirvaruṇasya̍ pAśAdityAha̍ varuṇapAśAdEva nirmucyatE̍ &gnE̱ vratapata Atmanaḥ pUrvA# tanUrAdEyEtyAhuḥ̍ kO hi tadvEda yad vasIyAnth̍ svE vaśE# BUtE punarvA̍ dadAti̍ na vEti grAvAṇO̍ vai sOmasya̍ rAjñO# malimlusEnA ya EvaM ~MvidvAn grAvṇṇaq AgnI̱ddhra upavAsayati̍ nainaM̍ malimlusEnA vindati̍ ( )||12

verses.padam: - Padam vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|hutvA|yUpa̱m|acCa|Eti|vaiṣṇavaḥ|vai|dEvata̍yA|yUpa̍ḥ|svayA̱|Eva|Enam|dEvata̍yA|acCa̍|Eti|atIti̍|anyAn|agA̱m|na|anyAn|upEti̍|agAm|iti̍|Aha|atIti̍|hi|anyAn|Eti̍|na|anyAn|upaitItyu̍pa-Eti̍|arvAk|tvA|parai̱ḥ|avidam|paraḥ|ava̍raiḥ|iti̍|Aha|arvAk|hi|Enam|parai̱ḥ|vindati̍|paraḥ|ava̍raiḥ|tam|tvA|juṣE|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vaiṣṇavyarcA hutvA yUpamacCaiti̍ vaiṣṇavO vai dEvatayA̍ yUpaḥ svayaivainaM̍ dEvatayA &cCaityatyanyAnagAM nAnyA-nupAgAmityAhAti̍ hyanyAnEti̍ nAnyA-nupaityarvAktvA parairavidaM̍ parO&varairityA̍hArvAgGyE̍naM̍ parai̱rvindati# parO&varaistaM̍ tvA# juṣE- [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vaiṣṇavam|dEvayajyAyA iti# dEva - yajyAyai̱|iti|Aha|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva-yajyAyai̱|hi|Enam|juṣatE̱|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|maddhvA̱|anaktu|iti|Aha|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|anakti|Oṣa̍dhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva-dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|iti|Aha|vajra̍ḥ|vai|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|śAntyai̱|svadhitEriti̍ sva - dhitEḥ|vRukṣasya|biBya̍taḥ|prathamEna̍|śaka̍lEna|saha|tEja̍ḥ|parEti̍|patati|yaḥ|prathamaḥ|śaka̍laḥ|parApatEditi̍# parA - patE̱t|tam|api|Eti̍|harEt|satE̍jasamiti̍ sa - tEjasam|14 (50)
verses.samhita: vaiṣṇavaM dEvayajyAyA̍ ityAha̍ dEvayajyAyai hyEnaM̍ juṣatE# dEvastvA# savitA maddhvAnattivatyA̍ha̍ tEjasaivaina̍-manaktyOṣa̍dhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsIrityAha̍ vajrO vai svadhitiḥ̍ śAntyai svadhitErvRukṣasya̍ biByataḥ̍ prathamEna śakalEna̍ saha tEjaḥ parA# patati yaḥ prathamaḥ̍ śakalaḥ̍ parApatEt tamapyA harEth̍ satEjasa-̍ [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Enam|Eti|harati|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|yUpA̱t|prayata̍ iti# pra - yataḥ|biByati|diva̱m|agrEṇa|mA|lEKIḥ|antari̍kṣam|maddhyE̍na|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|śamayati|vana̍spatE|śatava̍ḷśa̍ iti# śata - vala.śaḥ|vIti|rOha|iti̍|Avraśca̍na̍ ityA̱ - vraścanE|juhOti|tasmA̱t|Avraśca̍nAdityA̱̍ - vraścanAt|vRukṣAṇA̱m|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|uditi̍|tiṣṭhanti|sahasra̍vaḷśA̍ iti# sahasra# - vala.śAḥ|vIti|vayam|ruhEma|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|ana̍kṣasa~ggamityana̍kṣa̍ - sa~ggam|15 (50)
verses.samhita: -mEvainamA haratImE̍ vai lOkA yUpA̱t prayatO biByati̍ divamagrEṇa̍ mA lEKIrantari̍kṣaM̍ maddhyEna̍ mA hiṃsIrityA̍haiBya̍ EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByaḥ̍ śamayati vanaspatE̍ śatavaḷśO̍ vi rOhEtyAvraścanE̍ juhOti tasmA-̍ dAvraścanAd-vRukṣAṇAM̍ BUyAṃsa̍ uttiṣṭhanti̍ sahasravaḷśA̍ vi vayaṃ ruhEmEtyA̍hA-̍ &&*śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śAstE &nakṣasa~ggaM-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam vRuścEt|yat|akṣasa~ggamityakṣa̍ - sa~ggam|vRuścEt|adhaIṣamityadhaḥ̍ - Iṣam|yajamAnasya|pramAyu̍kamiti̍# pra-mAyukam|syAt|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|syAt|iti|ArOhamityA̱̍ - rOham|tasmai̱|vRuścEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|vanaspatInAm|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|apratiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayEta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|aparṇam|tasmai̱|śuṣkA̱gramiti̍ śuṣka# - agram|vRuścEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|vanaspatInAm|apaśavyaḥ|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|iti|bahuparṇamiti̍# bahu - parṇam|tasmai̱|bahuśAKamiti# bahu - śAKam|vRuścEt|Eṣaḥ|vai|16 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvRuścEd-yadakṣasa~ggaM̍ ~MvRuścEdadhaIṣaM̍ ~MyajamAnasya̍ pramAyukaṅ̍ syAdyaM kAmayEtApratiṣṭhitaḥ̍ syAdityArOhaM̍ tasma# vRuścEdEṣa vai vanaspatInA-mapra̍tiṣṭhitO&pra̍tiṣṭhita̍ Eva Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEtApaśuḥ̍ syAdityaparṇaM̍ tasmai śuṣkA̱graM ~MvRuścEdEṣa vai vanaspatInA-mapaśavyO̍&paśurEva̍ Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ paśumAnth syAditi# bahuparṇaM tasmai# bahuśAKaM ~MvRuścEdEṣa̍ vai- [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam vanaspatInAm|paśavya̍ḥ|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|pratiṣṭhitamiti̍ prati# - sthitam|vRuścEt|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA- kAmasya|Eṣaḥ|vai|vanaspatInAm|prati̍ṣṭhita̍ iti prati# - sthitaḥ|yaḥ|samE|BUmyai̱|svAt|yOnE̱ḥ|rUḍhaḥ|pratIti|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yaḥ|pratya~g|upa̍nata̍ ityupa-nataḥ|tam|vRuścEt|saḥ|hi|mEdha̱m|aBIti̍|upa̍nata̍ ityupa# - nataḥ|pa~jcAratnimiti̍ pa~jca-̍ aratnim|tasmai̱|vRuścEt|yam|kAmayEta|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|namEt|iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca-AkṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|upEti̍|Enam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - taraḥ|yajñaḥ|17 (50)
verses.samhita: vanaspatInAM̍ paśavyaḥ̍ paśumAnEva Bavati̍ pratiṣṭhitaM̍ ~MvRuścEt pratiṣṭhAkAmasyaiṣa̍ vai vanaspatInAM̍ pratiṣṭhitO̍ yaḥ samE BUmyai svAdyOnE# rUḍhaḥ pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yaḥ pratya~g~gupanatastaM̍ ~MvRuścEth̍ sa hi mEdhamaByupa̍nataḥ̍ pa~jcAratniM̍ tasmai# vRuścEdyaM kAmayEtOpainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO namEditi̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajña upainamutta̍rO̍ yajñO- [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam namati|ṣaḍaratnimiti̍ ṣaṭ - aratnim|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA- kAmasya|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|saptAra̍tnimiti̍# sapta - aratnim|paśukAmasyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|saptapadEti# sapta-padA|śakvarI|paśava̍ḥ|śakva̍rI|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|navA̍ratnimiti̍ nava# - aratnim|tEjaskAmasyEti̍ tEjaḥ̍ - kAmasya|trivRutEti# tri - vRutA̱|stOmEna|sammi̍tamiti̍ saM - mitam|tEjaḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|tEjasvI|Eva|Bavati|EkAdaśAratnimityEkA̍daśa-aratnim|indriyakA̍masyEtI̱ndriya-kAmasya|EkA̍daśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarA|triṣṭuk|indriyam|triṣṭuk|indriyAvI|Eva|Bavati|pa~jcadaśAratnimiti̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ - aratnim|BrAtRuvyavata̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - vataḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|vajraḥ|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - aBiBUtyai|saptadaśAratnimiti̍# saptadaśa̍ - aratnim|prajAkAmasyEti̍# prajA - kAmasya|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱ ( )|EkaviṃśatyaratnimityEka̍viṃśati̍ - aratnim|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmAnAm|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|aṣṭAśrirityaṣṭA - aśriḥ|Bavati|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA - akṣarA|gAyatrI|tEjaḥ|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|tEjasA|Eva|gAyatriyA|yajñamuKEnEti̍# yajña - muKEna|saMmi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ||18 (69) (juṣE - satEjasa̍ - manakṣasa~ggaM̍ - bahuśAKaM ~MvRuścEdEṣa̍ vai - yajña upainamutta̍rO̍ yajña - AptyA - EkAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: namati̍ ṣaḍaratniM̍ pratiṣṭhAkAmasya̍ ṣaḍvA Rutava# RutuṣvEva prati# tiṣṭhati saptAratniM̍ paśukAmasya̍ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ paśavaḥ śakvarI̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE navAratniM̍ tEjaskAmasya̍ trivRutA stOmEna̍ sammitaM̍ tEjastrivRut̍ tEjasvyE̍va̍ Bava-tyEkA̍daśAratni-mindriyakA̍ma-syaikA̍daśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭugindriyaM̍ triṣṭugindriyAvyE̍va̍ Bavati̍ pa~jcadaśAratniM̍ BrAtRuvyavataḥ̍ pa~jcadaśO vajrO BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ saptadaśAratniM̍ prajAkAmasya̍ saptadaśaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍ ( ) EkaviṃśatyaratniM̍ pratiṣṭhAkAma-syaikaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmAnAM̍ pratiṣṭhA pratiṣṭhityA̍ aṣṭAśrirBava-tyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI tEjO# gAyatrI gAyatrI̍ yajñamuKaM̍ tEjasaiva̍ gAyatriyA̍ yajñamuKEna̍ saMmitaḥ||18̍ (juṣE - satEjasa̍ - manakṣasa~ggaM̍ - bahuśAKaM ~MvRuścEdEṣa̍ vai - yajña upainamutta̍rO̍ yajña - AptyA - EkAnnaviṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam pRuthivyai|tvA|antarikṣAya|tvA|divE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ukṣati|parA̱~jcam|prEti̍|ukṣati|parA~g̍|iva|hi|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ-gaḥ|lOkaḥ|krUram|iva|vai|Etat|karOti|yat|Kanati|apaḥ|avEti̍|nayati|śAntyai̱|yava̍matIriti̍ yava-matIḥ|avEti̍|nayati|Urk|vai|yava̍ḥ|yaja̍mAnEna|yUpa̍ḥ|saMmi̍ta̍ iti saM - mitaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|tAva̍tIm|Eva|asminn|Urja̱m|dadhAti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pRuthivyai tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA divE tvEtyAhaiBya̍ EvainaM̍ ~MlOkEByaḥ prOkṣati̍ parA̱~jcaM prOkṣati̍ parA~giva̍ hi suvargO̍ lOkaḥ krUramiva̍ vA Etat karOti̍ yat KanatyapO&va̍# nayati śAntyai yavamatIrava̍# nayatyUrgvai yavO yajamAnEna̍ yUpaḥ saMmitO̍ yAvAnEva̍ yajamAna-stAva̍tI-mEvAsmi-nnUrja̍M̍ dadhAti- [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam pitRuṇAm|sadanam|asi|iti̍|barqḥiḥ|avEti̍|stRuṇAti|pitRudEvatya̍miti̍# pitRu - dEvatya̱m|hi|Etat|yat|niKAtamiti̍ ni - KAtam|yat|baraḥiḥ|anavastIryEtyana̍va̍ - stIrya|minuyAt|pitRudEvatya# iti# pitRu-dEvatyaḥ|niKA̍ta̍ iti ni-KAtaḥ|syAt|baraḥiḥ|avastIryEtyava̍ - stIrya|minOti|asyAm|Eva|Enam|minOti|yUpaśakalamiti̍# yUpa - śakalam|avEti|asyati|satE̍jasamiti̍ sa - tEjasam|Eva|Enam|minOti|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|maddhvA̱|anaktu|iti|Aha|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|anakti|supippalABya̍ iti# su-pippalAByaḥ|tvA|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|iti|caṣAla̱m|pratIti̍|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pitRuṇAṃ sadanamasIti̍# barqḥirava# stRuṇAti pitRudEvatyA̱(1q)ṅq hyEtad-yanniKA̍taM̍ ~Myad-barqḥiranavastIrya̍ minuyAt pitRudEvatyO̍# niKAtaḥ̍ syAd barqḥiravastIrya̍# minOtyasyAmEvainaM̍ minOti yUpaśakalamavA̱syati satEjasamEvaina̍M̍ minOti dEvastvA# savitA maddhvA&naktvityA̍ha̍ tEjasaivaina̍manakti̍ supippalABya-stvauṣadhIBya̍ iti# caṣAlaM prati-̍ [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam mu~jcati|tasmA̱t|śIrq.ṣataḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|Pala̱m|gRuhṇanti|anakti̍|tEja̍ḥ|vai|Ajya̱m|yaja̍mAnEna|agniṣṭhEtya̍gni-sthA|aśri̍ḥ|saMmitEti̍ saM - mitA|yat|agniṣṭhAmityagni-̍ sthAm|aśri̱m|anakti|yajamAnam|Eva|tEja̍sA|anakti|AntamityA̱̍ - antam|anakti|AntamityA̱ - antam|Eva|yajamAnam|tEja̍sA|anakti|sarvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|mRuśati|apa̍rivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|asminn|tEjaḥ|dadhAti|uditi̍|diva̱m|staBAna|Eti̍|antari̍kṣam|pRuṇa|iti̍|Aha|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|vidhRu̍tyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|21 (50)
verses.samhita: mu~jcati tasmA̱cCIṛṣata Oṣadhayaḥ̍ PalaM̍ gRuhṇantyanakti tEjO vA AjyaM ~MyajamAnEnAgniṣṭhA&śriḥ̍ saMmitA̍ yadagniṣṭhA-maśri̍manakti̍ yajamAnamEva̍ tEjasA̍ &naktyAnta-manaktyAntamEva̍ yajamAnaM̍ tEjasAnakti̍ sarvataḥ pari# mRuśatyaparivarga-mEvAsmin̍ tEjO# dadhAtyud divaṅ# staBAnA&ntarikṣaM̍ pRuṇEtyAhaiṣAM̍ ~MlOkAnAM ~MvidhRutyai̍ vaiṣṇavyarcA- [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam kalpayati|vaiṣṇavaḥ|vai|dEvatayA|yUpa̍ḥ|svayA̱|Eva|Enam|dEvata̍yA|kalpayati|dvAByA̱m|kalpayati|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yam|kAmayEta|tEja̍sA|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|indriyEṇa̍|vIti̍|ad^^rdhayEyam|iti̍|agniṣṭhAmitya̍gni̍ - sthAm|tasya|aśri̱m|AhavanIyAdityA̱-havanIyA̱t|ittham|vA|ittham|vA|atIti̍|nAvayEt|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|indriyEṇa̍|vIti̍|ad^^rdhayati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|tEja̍sA|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|indriyEṇa̍|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayEyam|iti̍|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kalpayati̍ vaiṣṇavO vai dEvatayA̍ yUpaḥ svayaivainaM̍ dEvatayA̍ kalpayati dvAByA̱M kalpayati dvipAd yajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ tEjasainaM̍ dEvatABirindriyEṇa̍ vyarddhayEya-mitya̍gniṣṭhAM̍ tasyAśri-mAhavanIyA̍ditthaM̍ ~MvEtthaM ~MvA&ti# nAvayEt tEjasaivaina̍M̍ dEvatABirindriyEṇa̍ vyarddhayati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ tEjasainaM̍ dEvatABirindriyEṇa̍ samarddhayEyamitya̍-̍ [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam agniṣṭhAmityagni̍ - sthAm|tasya|aśri̱m|AhavanIyEnEtyA̱̍ - havanIyEna|samiti̍|minuyAt|tEja̍sA|Eva|Enam|dEvatA̍Biḥ|indriyEṇa̍|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|brahmavanimiti̍# brahma - vani̱m|tvA|kṣatravanimiti# kṣatra-vani̱m|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|parIti|vyayati|Urk|vai|raśanA|yaja̍mAnEna|yUpa̍ḥ|saMmi̍ta̍ iti saM-mitaḥ|yajamAnam|Eva|UrjA|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|nABidaGna̍ iti# nABi - daGnE|parIti|vyayati|nABidaGna̍ iti# nABi - daGnE|Eva|asmai|Urja̱m|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|nABidaGna iti# nABi - daGnE|UrjA|Bu~jjatE|yam|kAmayEta|UrjA|Enam|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -gniṣṭhAM tasyAśrimAhavanIyE̍na̍ saM minuyAt̍ tEjasaivaina̍M̍ dEvatABirindriyEṇa̍ samarddhayati̍ brahmavaniM̍ tvA kṣatravanimityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat pari# vyayatyUrgvai raśanA̍ yajamAnEna̍ yUpaḥ saMmitO̍ yajamAnamEvOrjA̍ samarddhayati̍ nABidaGnE pari# vyayati nABidaGna EvAsmA UrjaM̍ dadhAti tasmA̱nnABidaGna UrjA Bu~jjatE̍ yaM kAmayEtOrjainaM-̍ [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam vIti|ad^^rdhayEyam|iti̍|Ud^^rdhvAm|vA|tasya̍|avA̍cIm|vA|avEti̍|UhEt|UrjA|Eva|Enam|vIti̍|ad^^rdhayati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|vaṛṣu̍kaḥ|parjanya̍ḥ|syAt|iti̍|avA̍cIm|avEti̍|UhEt|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|nIti̍|yacCati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|ava̍ṛṣukaḥ|syAt|iti̍|Ud^^rdhvAm|uditi̍|UhEt|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|uditi̍|yacCati|pitRuṇAm|niKA̍tamiti̍ ni - KAtam|manuṣyAṇAm|Ud^^rdhvam|niKA̍tAditi̍ ni - KAtAt|Eti|raśanAyA̱ḥ|Oṣa̍dhInAm|raśanA|viśvE̍ṣAM|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MvyarddhayEya-mityUrddhvAM̍ ~MvA tasyAvAcIM̍ ~MvA&vOhEdUrjaivainaM̍ ~Mvyarddhayati̍ yadi# kAmayEta̍ vaṛṣukaḥ̍ parjanyaḥ̍ syAditya-vAcImavO̍hEd̍ vRuṣṭimEva̍ ni yacCati̍ yadi# kAmayEtAvaṛṣukaḥ̍ syAdityUrddhvAmudUhEd̍ vRuṣṭimEvOd̍ yacCati̍ pitRuṇAM niKAtaM̍ manuṣyAṇAmUrddhvaM̍ niKAtAdA̍ raśanAyA̍ OṣadhInAṃ̍ raśanA viśvEṣAM-̍ [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAnA̱m|Ud^^rdhvam|raśanAyA̱ḥ|Eti|caṣAlA̱t|indra̍sya|caṣAla̱m|sAddhyAnA̱m|ati̍riktamityati̍# - riktam|saḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|sarvadEvatya# iti# sarva-dEvatyaḥ|yat|yUpa̍ḥ|yat|yUpa̱m|minOti̍|sarvA̱ḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱ḥ|prIṇAti|yajñEna̍|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|tE|amanyanta|manuṣyA̱ḥ|naḥ|anvABaviṣyantItya̍nu-ABa̍viṣyanti|iti̍|tE|yUpE̍na|yOpayitvA|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ-gam|lOkam|Ayann|tam|Ruṣayaḥ|yUpE̍na|Eva|anu̍|prEti̍|ajAnann|tat|yUpa̍sya|yUpatvamiti̍# yUpa- tvam|25 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvAnAmUrddhvaṃ̍ raśanAyA̍ A caṣAlAdindrasya̍ caṣAlaṃ# sAddhyAnAmatiriktaṃq̍ sa vA Eṣa sarvadEvatyO̍# yadyUpO yadyUpaM̍ minOti sarvA# Eva dEvatA̱ḥ prIṇAti yajñEna vai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tE&manyanta̍ manuṣyA# nO&nvABaviṣyantIti̍ tE yUpEna̍ yOpayitvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tamRuṣayO̍ yUpEnaivAnu̍ prAjAnan̍ tad yUpasya̍ yUpatvaM- [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam yat|yUpa̱m|minOti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|prajñA̱tyA̍ iti pra - jñAtyai|purastA̱t|minOti|purastA̱t|hi|yajñasya|prajñAyata̍ iti# pra - jñAyatE̱|aprajñAtamityapra̍# - jñAtam|hi|tat|yat|atipanna̍ ityati# - pannE|Ahuḥ|idam|kArya̱m|AsIt|iti|sAddhyAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|yajñam|atIti̍|amanyanta|tAn|yajñaḥ|na|aspRuśat|tAn|yat|yajñasya̍|ati̍riktamityati̍# - riktam|AsI̱t|tat|aspRuśat|atiriktamityati̍# - riktam|vai|Etat|yajñasya|yat|agnau|agnim|mathitvA|praharatIti̍# pra - harati|ati̍riktamityati̍# - riktam|Etat|26 (50)
verses.samhita: ~Myad yUpaM̍ minOti# suvargasya# lOkasya prajñA̱tyai purastA̱n minOti purastAddhi yajñasya# prajñAyatE prajñAtaṃq̍ hi tad yadatipanna̍ AhuridaM kAryamAsIditi̍# sAddhyA vai dEvA yajñamatyamanyanta̍ tAn. yajñO nAspRuśat̍ tAn. yad yajñasyAtiriktamAsIt̍ tadaspRuśadati̍riktaM̍ ~MvA Etad yajñasya yadagnAvagniM mathitvA̍ praharatyatiriktamEta-̍ [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam yUpasya|yat|Ud^^rdhvam|caṣAlA̱t|tEṣA̱m|tat|BAgadhEyamiti̍# BAga - dhEya̱m|tAn|Eva|tEna|prIṇAti|dEvAḥ|vai|saṅsthi̍ta̍ iti saM-sthitE|sOmE̱|prEti|sruca̍ḥ|aha̍rann|prEti̍|yUpa̱m|tE|amanyanta|yajñavEśasamiti̍# yajña - vEśasam|vai|idam|kurmaḥ|iti|tE|prastaramiti̍# pra - staram|srucAm|niṣkrayaṇamiti̍# niḥ - krayaṇam|apaśyann|svaru̱m|yUpa̍sya|saṅsthi̍ta̍ iti saM - sthitE|sOmE̱|prEti|prastaramiti̍# pra-staram|harati|juhOti̍|svaru̱m|aya̍jñavEśasAyEtyaya̍jña-vEśasAya||27̍ (42) (dadhAti - pratyRu - cA - samarddhayEyamityU̍ - rjainaM - ~MviśvEṣAM̍ - ~MyUpatva - matiriktamEtad̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: -dyUpasya̍ yadUrddhvaM caṣAlAt tEṣAM tad BAgadhEyaM̍ tAnEva tEna# prIṇAti dEvA vai saṅsthitE̍ sOmE pra srucO&haran̍ pra yUpaM tE&manyanta̍ yajñavEśasaM ~MvA idaM kurma̍ iti tE prastaraṅ̍ srucAM niṣkrayaṇa-mapaśyanth̍ svaruM ~MyUpasya̍ saṅsthitE̍ sOmE pra prastaraṃ̍ harati̍ juhOti svarumayajñavEśasAya||27̍ (dadhAti - pratyRu - cA - samarddhayEyamityU̍ - rjainaM - ~MviśvEṣAM̍ - ~MyUpatva - matiriktamEtad̍ - dvicatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sAddhyAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|asminn|lOkE|Asann|na|anyat|kim|cana|miṣat|tE|agnim|Eva|agnayE̱|mEdhAya|Eti̍|alaBanta|na|hi|anyat|AlaByaM̍mityA̱-laByaM̱m|avi̍ndann|tata̍ḥ|vai|imAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|ajAyanta|yat|agnau|agnim|mathitvA|praharatIti̍# pra - harati|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra-jananAya|rudraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|paśuḥ|yat|paśum|AlaByEtyA̱̍ - laBya|agnim|manthE̱t|rudrAya̍|yaja̍mAnam|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sAddhyA vai dEvA asmi~MllOka Asan̍ nAnyat kiM̍ cana miṣat tE̱&gnimEvAgnayE mEdhAyA &laBanta̍ na hyanyadA̍laByaM̍-mavi̍ndan̍ tatO vA imAḥ prajAḥ prAjAyanta̍ yadagnAvagniM mathitvA̍ praharati̍ prajAnA̱M prajananAya̍ rudrO vA Eṣa yadagniryajamAnaḥ̍ paśuryat paśumAlaByAgniM manthE̱d rudrAya yajamAna-̍ [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam apIti|daddhyAt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra-mAyukaḥ|syAt|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|haviḥ|Etat|yat|paśuḥ|iti̍|yat|paśum|AlaByEtyA̱-laBya̍|agnim|mantha̍ti|havyAya̍|Eva|Asa̍nnAyEtyA-sannAya|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|janayati|upAkRutyEtyu̍pa̍ - AkRutya|Eva|manthya̍ḥ|tat|na|iva|Ala̍bdhamityA̍ - labdham|na|iva|AlabdhamityanA̱̍ - labdham|agnEḥ|janitra̱m|asi|iti|Aha|agnEḥ|hi|Etat|janitra̱m|vRuṣa̍ṇau|sthaḥ|iti̍|Aha|vRuṣa̍ṇau|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mapi# daddhyAt pramAyukaḥ̍ syAdathO KalvAhuragniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA# havirEtadyat paśuriti yat paśumAlaByAgniM manthati̍ havyAyaivA&&*sannAya̍ sarvA# dEvatA# janaya-tyupAkRutyaiva manthya-stannEvA&&*labdhaM̍ nEvAnAlabdha-magnE-rjanitra̍-masItyA̍hAgnErhyE̍ta-jjanitraM̍ ~MvRuṣaṇau̍ stha ityAha̍ vRuṣaṇau-̍ [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam hi|Etau|urvaśI̱|asi|Ayuḥ|asi|iti|Aha|mithunatvAyEti̍# mithuna - tvAya|GRutEna̍|aktE̍ iti|vRuṣa̍ṇam|dadhAthAm|iti̍|Aha|vRuṣa̍ṇam|hi|EtE̍ iti|dadhA̍tE̍ iti|yE̍ iti|agnim|gAyatram|Canda̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyasva|iti̍|Aha|CandO̍Biriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|prEti|janayati|agnayE̱|mathyamA̍nAya|anviti̍|brUhi|iti̍|Aha|sAvitrIm|Ruca̱m|anviti̍|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu-prasUtaḥ|Eva|Enam|manthati|jAtAya|anviti̍|brUhi|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hyEtA-vurvaśya̍syAyu-rasItyA̍ha̍ mithunatvAya# GRutEnAktE vRuṣaṇaM̍ dadhAthAmityAha̍ vRuṣaṇaṅq̍ hyEtE̍ dadhAtE̍ yE agniM gAyatraM̍ CandO&nu pra jAyasvEtyA̍ha̍ CandOBirEvainaM̍ pra janayatyagnayE̍# mathyamAnAyAnu̍# brUhItyAha̍ sAvitrImRucamanvAha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvainaM̍ manthati jAtAyAnu# brUhi- [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam prahriyamAṇAyEti̍# pra - hriyamAṇAya|anviti̍|brUhi|iti̍|Aha|kAṇḍE̍kAṇḍa̍ iti kAṇḍE̱ - kAṇḍE|Eva|Enam|kriyamAṇE|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|gAyatrIḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|anviti̍|Aha|gAyatraCa̍ndA̍ iti# gAyatra-CandAḥ|vai|agniḥ|svEna|Eva|Enam|Canda̍sA|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|agniḥ|purA|Bava̍ti|agnim|mathitvA|prEti̍|harati|tau|saBaMva̍ntAviti̍# saM - Bavantau|yaja̍mAnam|aBi|samiti̍|Bavataḥ|Bava̍tam|naḥ|sama̍nasAviti̍ sa - manasau|iti|Aha|śAntyai̱|prahRutyEti̍# pra-hRutya|juhOti|jAtAya̍|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|apIti̍# ( )|dadhAti|AjyEna|juhOti|Etat|vai|agnEḥ|priyam|dhAma̍|yat|Ajya̱m|priyEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|dhAmnA̱|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|athO̍ iti|tEja̍sA||31̍ (68)
verses.samhita: prahriyamAṇAyAnu̍# brUhItyAha̍ kAṇḍEkAṇḍa̍ EvainaM̍ kriyamAṇE̍ samarddhayati̍ gAyatrIḥ sarvA anvAha̍ gAyatraCandA̍ vA agniḥ svEnaivainaM CandasA̍ samarddhayatyagniḥ̍ purA BavatyagniM̍ mathitvA̍ pra harati̍ tau saBaMvantau̍ yajamAnamaBi̍ saM BavatO̍ BavataM̍ naḥ samanasAvityA̍ha̍ śAntyai̱ prahRutya# juhOti jAtAyaivAsmA annamapi# ( ) dadhAtyAjyEna̍ juhOtyEtadvA agnEḥ priyaM dhAma yadAjyaM̍ priyEṇaivainaM dhAmnA samarddhayatyathO̍ tEjasA||31̍

verses.padam: - Padam iṣE|tvA|iti|barqḥiḥ|Eti̍|dattE|icCatE̱|iva|hi|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|upavIrityu̍pa̍ - vIḥ|asi|iti|Aha|upEti̍|hi|EnAn|AkarOtItyA̱̍ - karOti|upO̍ iti|dEvAn|daivI̱ḥ|viśa̍ḥ|prEti̍|aguḥ|iti̍|Aha|daivI̱ḥ|hi|EtAḥ|viśa̍ḥ|satIḥ|dEvAn|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|vahnI̱ḥ|uśija̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|Rutvija̍ḥ|vai|vahna̍yaḥ|uśija̍ḥ|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|bRuha̍spatE|dhAraya̍|vasU̍ni|iti̍|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iṣE tvEti# barqḥirA datta̍ icCata# iva hyEṣa̍ yO yajata̍ upavIrasItyAhOpa hyEnAnAkarOtyupO̍# dEvAn daivIrviśaḥ prAgurityAha̍ daivIrhyEtA̍ viśaḥ̍ satIrdEvAnupayanti̍ vahnIruśija̍ ityAhartvijO̍ vai vahnaya̍ uśija-stasmAdEvamA̍ha̍ bRuhaspatE̍ dhArayA vasUnItyA-̍ [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|brahma|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|brahma̍ṇA|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|havyA|tE|svadantAm|iti̍|Aha|svadaya̍ti|Eva|EnAn|dEva̍|tvaṣṭaḥ|vasu̍|raṇva|iti̍|Aha|tvaṣṭA̱|vai|paśUnAm|mithunAnA̱m|rUpakRuditi̍# rUpa - kRut|rUpam|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|rEva̍tIḥ|rama̍ddhvam|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|rEvatI̱ḥ|paśUn|Eva|asmai|ramayati|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|pasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ha brahma vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspati rbrahmaṇaivAsmai̍# paśUnava# rundhE havyA tE̱ svadantAmityAha̍ svadayatyEvainAn̍ dEva# tvaṣṭarvasu# raṇvEtyAha̍ tvaṣṭA vai paśUnAM̍ mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRud rUpamEva paśuṣu# dadhAti rEvatI̍ ramaddhvamityA̍ha̍ paśavO vai rEvatI̱ḥ paśUnEvAsmai# ramayati dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ iti-̍ [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam raśanAm|Eti|dattE|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|iti|Aha|aśvinau̱|hi|dEvAnA̱m|addhvaryU̍ iti|AstA̱m|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|iti̍|Aha|yatyai̱|Rutasya̍|tvA|dEvahaviriti̍# dEva - haviḥ|pAśEna|Eti̍|raBE|iti̍|Aha|satyam|vai|Rutam|satyEna̍|Eva|Enam|RutEna̍|Eti̍|raBatE|akṣṇayA|parIti̍|harati|vaddhya̱m|hi|pratya~jca̱m|pratimu~jcantIti̍# prati - mu~jcanti|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|dhaṛṣa̍|mAnu̍ṣAn|iti̍|nIti̍|yunakti|dhRutyai̱|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|34 (50)
verses.samhita: raśanAmA dattE̍ prasU̱tyA aśvinO̱rbAhuByA-mityAhAśvinau̍ hi dEvAnAmaddhvaryU̍ AstA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmityAha̍ yatyA# Rutasya# tvA dEvahaviḥ pAśEnA&&* raBa̍ ityAha̍ satyaM ~MvA Rutaṃ satyEnaivainamRutEnA̍ &&*raBatE̍ &kṣṇayA pari# harati vaddhyaṃq hi pratya~jcaM̍ prati mu~jcanti vyAvRuttyai̍ dhaṛṣA mAnuṣAniti̍ ni yunakti̍ dhRutyA# adBya- [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|prEti|ukṣAmi|iti̍|Aha|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|saBaMvatIti# saM - Bavati|yat|paśuḥ|apAm|pEruḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|hi|apAm|pAtA|yaḥ|mEdhA̍ya|AraByata̍ ityA̱-raByatE̱|svAttam|cit|sadEvamiti̍ sa - dEvam|havyam|Apaḥ|dEvIḥ|svada̍ta|Enam|iti̍|Aha|svadaya̍ti|Eva|Enam|upari̍ṣṭAt|prEti̍|ukṣati|upari̍ṣṭAt|Eva|Enam|mEddhya̱m|karOti|pAyaya̍ti|antarataḥ|Eva|Enam̍ ( )|mEddhya̱m|karOti|adhastA̱t|upEti|ukṣati|sarvata̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|mEddhya̱m|karOti||35̍ (60)
verses.samhita: stvauṣadhIByaḥ̍ prOkṣAmItyAhAdByO̍ hyEṣa̍ OṣadhIByaḥ̍ saBaMvati̍ yat paśurapAM pErurasItyAhaiṣa̍ hyapAM̍ pAtA yO mEdhAyA&&*̍ raByatE̱ svAttaM cith sadEvaṃ̍ havyamApO# dEvIḥ svadatainamityA̍ha̍ svadayatyEvaina̍-mupari̍ṣṭAt̍ prOkṣatyupari̍ṣṭAdEvainaM̍ mEddhyaM̍ karOti pAyayatyantarata̍ EvainaM ( ) mEddhyaM̍ karOtyadhastAdupO̱kṣati sarvata# EvainaM mEddhyaM̍ karOti||35

verses.padam: - Padam agninA̱|vai|hOtrA̱|dEvAḥ|asurAn|aBIti̍|aBavann|agnayE̱|samiddhyamA̍nAyEti̍# saM - iddhyamAnAya|anviti̍|brUhi|iti̍|Aha|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya-aBiBUtyai|saptadaśEti̍# sapta - daśa|sAmidhEnIriti# sAM - idhEnIḥ|anviti|Aha|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|saptadaśEti# sapta - daśa|anviti|Aha|dvAda̍śa|mAsA̱ḥ|pa~jca̍|Rutava̍ḥ|saḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|anu|prEti̍|jAyantE|prajAnAmiti̍# pra-jAnA̱m|prajananAyEti̍# pra-jananAya|dEvAḥ|vai|sAmidhEnIriti̍# sAM-idhEnIḥ|anUcyEtyanu̍ - ucya|yajñam|na|anviti̍|apaśyann|saḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|tUṣṇIm|AGAramityA̱-GAram|36 (50)
verses.samhita: agninA vai hOtrA# dEvA asurA-naBya̍Bava-nnagnayE̍# samiddhyamAnAyAnu̍# brUhItyAha̍ BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ saptadaśa̍ sAmidhEnIranvAha̍ saptadaśaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyai̍# saptadaśAnvAha̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsAḥ pa~jcartavaḥ sa saM~Mvathsaraḥ̍ saM~MvathsaraM̍ prajA anu prajAyantE̍ prajAnA̱M prajananAya̍ dEvA vai sAmidhEnIranUcya̍# yajñaM nAnvapaśyanth̍ sa prajApati-stUṣṇImA̍GAra-̍ [ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|aGArayat|tata̍ḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|yajñam|anviti̍|apaśyann|yat|tUṣṇIm|AGAramityA̱̍ - GAram|AGArayatItyA̱ - GArayati|yajñasya̍|anu̍KyAtyA̍ ityanu# - KyAtyai|asurEṣu|vai|yajñaḥ|AsIt|tam|dEvAḥ|tUṣṇIṃqhOmEnEti̍# tUṣṇIm-hOmEna|avRu~jjata|yat|tUṣṇIm|AGAramityA̱̍ - GAram|AGArayatItyA̱ - GArayati|BrAtRu̍vyasya|Eva|tat|yajñam|vRu~gktE|paridhIniti̍# pari - dhIn|samiti|mArṣṭi|punAti̍|Eva|EnAn|tristririti̍ triḥ - triḥ|samiti|mArṣṭi|tryA̍vRuditi̍ tri - AvRut|hi|yajñaḥ|athO iti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|dvAdaśa|samiti̍|padyantE|dvAda̍śa|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mA &GArayat̍ tatO vai dEvA yajñamanvapaśyanq.̍ yat tUṣṇI-mAGAra-mA̍GAraya̍ti̍ yajñasyAnuKyAtyA̍ asurEṣu̍ vai yajña AsIt̍ taM dEvAstU̱ṣṇIṃ hOmEnAvRu~jjata̍ yat tUṣṇI-mAGAra-mA̍GAraya̍ti̍ BrAtRuvyasyai̍ va tad yajñaM ~MvRu~gktE̍ paridhInth̍ saM mA̱rṣṭi punAtyEvainAn tristriḥ saM mA̱rṣṭi tryAvRuddhi̍ yajñO&thO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ dvAdaśa̍ saM padyantE̍ dvAdaśa-̍ [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam mAsA̱ḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM-vathsaram|Eva|prIṇAti|athO iti|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|Eva|asmai|upEti|dadhAti|suvargasyEti̍# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|sama̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM - aṣṭyai|śiraḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|AGAra̍ ityA̱ - GAraḥ|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|yat|AGAramityA̱-GAram|AGArayatItyA̱-GArayati|śIrq.ṣataḥ|Eva|yajñasya̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|śira̍ḥ|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|yat|AGAra̍ ityA̱ - GAraḥ|AtmA|paśuḥ|AGAramityA̱ - GAram|AGAryEtyA̱ - GArya|paśum|samiti̍|anakti|Atmann|Eva|yajñasya̍|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ saM~MvathsaramEva̍ prIṇAtyathO̍# saM~MvathsaramEvAsmA upa# dadhAti suvargasya# lOkasya samaṣṭyai̍ śirO vA Etad yajñasya yadAGArO̱&gniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA yadAGAra-mA̍GAraya̍ti̍ śIṛṣata Eva yajñasya yajamAnaḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA ava# rundhE śirO vA Etad yajñasya yadAGAra̍ AtmA paśurAGAramAGArya̍# paśuṃ samanaktyAtmannEva̍ yajñasya- [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam śiraḥ|pratIti̍|dadhAti|samiti̍|tE|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vAyunA̱|gacCatAm|iti|Aha|vAyudEvatya̍# iti# vAyu-dEvatyaḥ|vai|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vAyau|Eva|asya|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|juhOti|samiti|yaja̍traiḥ|a~ggA̍ni|samiti̍|yajñapa̍tiriti̍# yajña - patiḥ|AśiṣEtyA̱ - śiṣA̱|iti|Aha|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|Eva|asya|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|gamayati|viśvarUpa̍ iti# viśva - rUpaḥ|vai|tvAṣṭraḥ|upariṣṭAt|paśum|aBIti̍|avamIt|tasmA̱t|upari̍ṣṭAt|paśOḥ|na|avEti̍|dyanti|yat|upari̍ṣṭAt|paśum|samanaktIti̍# saM - anakti|mEddhya̱m|Eva|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śiraḥ prati# dadhAti saM tE̱ prAṇO vAyunA# gacCatAmityAha̍ vAyudEvatyO# vai prAṇO vAyAvEvAsya# prAṇaM juhOti̍ saM ~Myajatraira~ggA̍ni̍ saM ~MyajñapatirAśiṣEtyA̍ha̍ yajñapatimEvAsyA&&*śiṣa̍M̍ gamayati viśvarUpO̍ vai tvAṣṭra upariṣṭAt̍ paśumaByavamIt̍ tasmA-dupari̍ṣṭAt̍ paśOrnAva# dyanti yadupariṣṭAt̍ paśuṃ samanakti̍ mEddhyamEvai-̍ [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam Enam|karOti|Rutvijaḥ|vRuṇItE|CandAṃ̍si|Eva|vRuṇItE|sapta|vRuṇItE|sapta|grAmyAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|sapta|CandAṃ̍si|uBaya̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|EkAdaśa|prayAjAniti̍# pra - yAjAn|yajati|daśa|vai|paśOḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra-anAḥ|AtmA|EkAdaśaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|paśuḥ|tam|prEti̍|yajati|vapAm|Eka̍ḥ|parIti̍|śayE|AtmA|Eva|AtmAna̱m|parIti̍|śayE|vajra̍ḥ|vai|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|vajraḥ|yUpaśakala̍ iti# yUpa - śakalaḥ|GRutam|Kalu|vai̍ ( )|dEvAḥ|vajra̱m|kRutvA|sOma̱m|aGnann|GRutEna|aktau|paśum|trAyEthAm|iti̍|Aha|vajrE̍ṇa|Eva|Enam|vaśE̱|kRutvA|Eti̍|laBatE||40̍ (68)
verses.samhita: -naM̍ karOtyRutvijO# vRuṇItE CandAṅsyEva̍ vRuṇItE̍ sapta vRuṇItE̍ sapta grAmyAḥ paśavaḥ̍ saptA&&*raṇyAḥ sapta CandAṅsyuBayasyA̍ varuddhyA̍ EkAdaśa̍ prayAjAn. yajati̍ daśa vai paśOḥ prAṇA AtmaikAdaśO̍ yAvAnEva̍ paśustaM pra yajati̍ vapAmEkaḥ pari# śaya AtmaivA&&*tmAnaM pari# śayE vajrO vai svadhitirvajrO̍# yUpaśakalO GRutaM Kalu vai ( ) dEvA vajraM̍ kRutvA sOmamaGnan̍ GRutEnAktau paśuM trAyEthAmityA̍ha̍ vajrEṇaivainaM̍ ~MvaśE# kRutvA&&laBatE||40̍

verses.padam: - Padam paryagnIti pari# - agni|karOti|sarvahutamiti# sarva-huta̱m|Eva|Enam|karOti|askandAya|aska̍nnam|hi|tat|yat|hutasya̍|skanda̍ti|triḥ|paryagnIti̍ pari# - agni|karOti|tryAvRuditi̍ tri - AvRut|hi|yajñaḥ|athO iti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|brahmavAdina iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|anvAraBya̍ ityanu̍ - AraByaḥ|paśU(3)ḥ|na|anvAraByA(3)̍ ityanu̍ -AraByA(3)ḥ|iti|mRutyavE̱|vai|Eṣaḥ|nIyatE|yat|paśuḥ|tam|yat|anvAraBEtEtya̍nu-AraBE̍ta|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra-mAyukaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|suvargAyEti̍# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|Eṣaḥ|lOkAya̍|nIyatE|yat|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paryagni̍ karOti sarvahutamEvaina̍M̍ karOtya-skandAyA-ska̍nnaṃq̍ hi tad yad dhutasya skandati̍ triḥ paryagni̍ karOti tryAvRuddhi̍ yajñO&thO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ brahmavAdinO# vadantyanvAraByaḥ̍ paśU(3)rnAnvAraByA(3) iti# mRutyavE vA Eṣa nIyatE̍ yat paśustaM ~MyadanvAraBE̍ta̍ pramAyukO̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ syAdathO KalvAhuḥ̍ suvargAya vA Eṣa lOkAya# nIyatE yat- [ ] 41

verses.padam: - Padam paśuḥ|iti|yat|na|anvAraBEtEtya̍nu̍ - AraBEta|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|yajamAnaḥ|hIyEta|vapAśrapa̍ṇIByAmiti̍# vapA - śrapaṇIByAm|anvAra̍Bata̍ ityanu̍ - AraBatE|tat|na|iva|anvAra̍bdhamitya̍nu-Ara̍bdham|na|iva|ana̍nvArabdhamityana̍nu-Arabdham|upa̍|prEti̍|iṣya|hOtaḥ|havyA|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|iṣitam|hi|karma̍|kriyatE̱|rEva̍tIḥ|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|priyadhEti# priya - dhA|Eti|viśata|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|agninA̱|purastA̱t|Eti|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|pRuthivyAḥ|sapRuMca iti# saM - pRucaḥ|pAhi|iti̍|barqḥiḥ|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśuriti yannAnvAraBEta̍ suvargAllOkAd yajamAnO̍ hIyEta vapAśrapaṇIByA-manvAra̍BatE̍ tannEvAnvArabdhaM̍ nEvAnanvArabdhamupa̍ prEṣya# hOtaṛhavyA dEvEBya ityAhEṣitaṃ̍ hi karma# kriyatE rEvatIryajñapa̍tiM̍ priyadhA &&viśatEtyA̍ha̍ yathAyajurEvaitadagninA# purastAdEti̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ pRuthivyAḥ sapRuMcaḥ̍ pAhIti# barqḥi- [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam upEti|asyati|aska̍ndAya|aska̍nnam|hi|tat|yat|barqḥiṣi̍|skanda̍ti|athO̍ iti|barqḥiṣadamiti̍# baṛhi - sada̱m|Eva|Enam|karOti|parA~g|Eti̍|vartatE|addhvaryuḥ|paśOḥ|sajñaMqpyamA̍nAditi̍# saM - jñapyamAnAt|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu - Byaḥ|Eva|tat|nIti|hnutE|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱vraskAyEtyanA̱-vraskAya|gacCa̍ti|śriya̱m|prEti̍|paśUn|ApnOti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|paścAllOkEti̍# paścAt - lOkA|vai|EṣA|prAcI̱|udAnIyata̍ ityut̍ - AnIyatE|yat|patnI̱|nama̍ḥ|tE|AtAnEtyA̱̍ - tAna|iti|Aha|Adityasya̍|vai|raśmaya̍ḥ|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rupA̱syatya-skandAyA-ska̍nnaṃq̍ hi tad yad barqḥiṣi skandatyathO# baṛhiṣadamEvaina̍M̍ karOti parA~gA vartatE&ddhvaryuḥ̍ paśOḥ sa̱jñaMqpyamAnAt̍ paśuBya# Eva tanni hnuta̍ AtmanO&nA̱vraskAya gacCati̍ śriyaM pra paśUnA̱pnOti ya EvaM ~MvEda# paścAllOkA̍ vA EṣA prAcyudAnIyatE̍ yat patnI namasta̍ AtAnEtyAhA&&*dityasya̍ vai raśmaya-̍ [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam AtAnA ityA̱ - tAnAḥ|tEByaḥ|Eva|nama̍ḥ|karOti|anarvA|prEti̍|ihi|iti̍|Aha|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|vai|arvA̱|BrAtRu̍vyApanuttyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya̍ - apanuttyai|GRutasya|kulyAm|anviti̍|saha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saha|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE|Apa̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|śuddhAyuva̍ iti# śuddha - yuvaḥ|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat||44 (37) (lOkAya# nIyatE yad - baraḥI - raśmayaḥ̍ - saptatriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: AtAnAstEBya# Eva namaskarOtyanarvA̍ prEhItyAha̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ vA arvA BrAtRuvyApanuttyai̍ GRutasya# kulyAmanu# saha prajayA# saha rAyaspOṣEṇE-tyAhA̍ &&*śiṣamEvaitAmA̍ śA̱sta ApO# dEvIḥ śuddhAyuva ityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat||44 (lOkAya# nIyatE yad - baraḥI - raśmayaḥ̍ - saptatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam paśOḥ|vai|AlabdhasyEtyA̍ - labdhasya|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|śuk|RucCati|vAk|tE|Eti|pyAyatAm|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|tE|Eti|pyAyatAm|iti̍|Aha|prAṇEBya̍ iti# pra - anEByaḥ|Eva|asya|śuca̱m|śamayati|sA|prAṇEBya̍ iti# pra - anEByaḥ|adhIti̍|pRuthivIm|śuk|prEti̍|viśati|śam|ahO̱ByAmityaha̍ḥ̍ - ByAm|iti|nIti̍|nayati|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ-rAtrAByA̱m|Eva|pRuthivyai|śuca̱m|śamayati|Oṣa̍dhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva - dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|iti|Aha|vajra̍ḥ|vai|svadhi̍tiriti̍ sva - dhitiḥ|45 (50)
verses.samhita: paśOrvA Alabdhasya̍ prAṇA~jCugRucCati̍ vAkta A pyAyatAM̍ prAṇasta A pyAyatAmityA̍ha̍ prAṇEBya# EvAsya śucaṃ# śamayati sA prAṇEByO&dhi# pRuthivIṃ śuk pra viśati̍ śamahO̱ByAmiti ni nayatyahOrAtrAByA̍mEva̍ pRuthivyai̍ śucaṃ# śamayatyOṣadhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsIrityAha̍ vajrOq vai svadhitiḥ-̍ [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam śAntyai̱|pArśvataḥ|Eti|C^^yati|maddhyataḥ|hi|manuṣyA̱ḥ|AcCyantItyA̱-Cyanti̍|tiraścIna̱m|Eti̍|Cyati|anUcIna̱m|hi|manuṣyA̱ḥ|AcCyantItyA̱̍ - Cyanti|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|rakṣa̍sAm|BAgaḥ|asi|iti̍|sthavimataḥ|barqḥiḥ|aktvA|apEti̍|asyati|asnA|Eva|rakṣAṃ̍si|nirava̍dayata̍ iti# niḥ - avadayatE|idam|aham|rakṣa̍ḥ|adhamam|tama̍ḥ|nayAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|iti̍|Aha|dvau|vAva|puru̍ṣau|yam|ca|Eva|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śAntyai# pArśvata A cCyati̍ maddhyatO hi manuṣyA̍# A cCyanti# tiraścInamA cCyatyanUcInaṃq̍ hi manuṣyA̍# AcCyanti vyAvRuttyai̍ rakṣasAM̍ BAgO&sIti̍# sthavimatO barqḥiraktvA&pA̱syatyasnaiva rakṣAṃsi̍ niravadayata̍ idamahaṃ rakṣO&dhamaM̍ tamO# nayAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma ityAha̍ dvau vAva puruṣau̍ yaM caiva- [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam dvEṣṭi|yaḥ|ca|Enam|dvEṣṭi̍|tau|uBau|adhamam|tama̍ḥ|nayati|iṣE|tvA|iti̍|vapAm|uditi̍|Kidati|icCatE̱|iva|hi|Eṣaḥ|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|yat|upatRundyAdityu̍pa̍ - tRundyAt|rudraḥ|asya|paśUn|GAtukaḥ|syAt|yat|na|upatRundyAdityu̍pa̍ - tRundyAt|ayatA|syAt|anyayA̱|upatRuṇattItyu̍pa̍ - tRuṇatti|anyayA̱|na|dhRutyai̱|GRutEna̍|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti# dyAvA-pRuthivI|prEti|UrṇvAthAm|iti̍|Aha|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Eva|rasEna|anakti|acCi̍nnaḥ|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvEṣṭi yaścainaM̍ dvEṣṭi tAvuBAvadhamaM̍ tamO# nayatIṣE tvEti# vapAmutKidatIcCata̍# iva hyEṣa̍ yO yajatE̍ yadupatRundyAd-rudrO̱&sya̍ paśUn GAtukaḥ̍ syAd yannOpatRundyA-daya̍tA̍ syA-danyayOpatRuṇattyanyayA̍ na dhRutyai# GRutEna# dyAvApRuthivI prOrṇvAthAmityA̍ha̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ Eva rasEnAnaktyacCi̍nnO-̍ [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam rAyaḥ|suvIra̍ iti# su - vIraḥ|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|krUram|iva|vai|Etat|karOti|yat|vapAm|utKidatItyut̍ - Kidati|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|iti̍|Aha|śAntyai̱|prEti̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|asmAt|lOkAt|cyavatE|yaḥ|paśum|mRutyavE̱|nIyamA̍nam|anvAraBa̍ta̍ ityanu̍ - AraBatE|vapAśrapa̍ṇI̍ iti# vapA - śrapaṇI|puna̍ḥ|anvAra̍Bata̍ ityanu̍ - AraBatE|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|agninA̱|purastA̱t|Eti|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa-hatyai|athO̍ iti|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|havyEna̍|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rAyaḥ̍ suvIra ityAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitat krUramiva̍ vA Etat karOti̍ yad vapA-mutKida-tyurva̍ntari̍kṣa-manvihItyA̍ha̍ śAntyai pra vA EṣO̱&smAllOkAccyavatE̍ yaḥ paśuM mRutyavE# nIyamAnamanvAraBa̍tE̍ vapAśrapaṇI̍ punaranvAra̍BatE&sminnEva̍ lOkE prati# tiṣṭhatyagninA# purastAdEti̍ rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ athO# dEvatA# Eva havyEnA- [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam anviti|Eti|na|antamam|a~ggA̍ram|atIti̍|harEt|yat|antamam|a~ggA̍ram|atiharEditya̍ti̍ - harE̱t|dEvatA̱ḥ|atIti|manyEta|vAyO̍ iti|vIti̍|ihi|stOkAnA̱m|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|viBa̍ktA̍ iti vi - BaktAḥ|stOkAḥ|avEti|padyantE|agra̱m|vai|Etat|paśUnAm|yat|vapA|agra̱m|Oṣa̍dhInAm|barqḥiḥ|agrE̍ṇa|Eva|agra̱m|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|athO̍ iti|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|Eva|paśUn|pratIti̍|sthApayati|svAhA̍kRutIBya̍ iti svAhAkRuti̍ - Byaḥ|prEti|iṣya|iti̍|Aha|49̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nvEti̍ nAntamama~ggAramati̍# harEd yadantamama~ggA̍ramati̍ harE̱d-dEvatA ati# manyEta vAyO vIhi# stOkAnAmityAha̍ tasmAd viBaktAḥ̍ stOkA ava# padyantE&graM ~MvA Etat paśUnAM̍ ~Myad vapA&gramOṣadhInAM̍ barqḥiragrEṇaivAgraṃq̍ samarddhayatyathO̍ OṣadhIṣvEva̍ paśUn pratiṣṭhApayati̍ svAhAkRutIByaḥ̍ prEṣyEtyAha-̍ [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam yajñasya|sami̍ṣṭyA̍ iti saM-iṣṭyai|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa-apAnau|vai|Etau|paśUnAm|yat|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|AtmA|vapA|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|aBiGAryEtyaBi̍ - GArya|vapAm|aBIti̍|GArayati|Atman|Eva|paśUnAm|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|dadhAti|svAhA̱|Ud^^rdhvanaBasamityUd^^rdhva̍ - naBasam|mArutam|gacCatam|iti|Aha|Ud^^rdhvana̍BA̍ ityUd^^rdhva - naBAḥ|ha|sma|vai|mArutaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|vapAśrapaṇI̍ iti# vapA - śrapaṇI|prEti̍|harati|tEna̍|Eva|EnE̍ iti|prEti̍|harati|viṣU̍cI̍ iti|prEti̍|harati|tasmA̱t|viṣva̍~jcau|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau||50 (46) (svadhiti̍ - ścaivA - cCinnO̍ - havyEnE - ṣyEtyAha̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: yajñasya samiṣṭyai̍ prAṇApAnau vA Etau paśUnAM̍ ~Myat pRuṣadAjyamAtmA̍ vapA pRuṣadAjyama̍BiGArya̍# vapAmaBi GArayatyAtmannEva̍ paśUnAM̍ prAṇApAnau̍ dadhAti̍ svAhOrddhvanaBasaM̍ mArutaM gacCatamityA̍hOrddhvana̍BA̍ ha sma vai mArutO̍ dEvAnA̱M ~MvapAśrapaṇI̍ pra harati̍ tEnaivainE pra harati̍ viṣUcI̍ pra harati̍ tasmAd viṣva~jcau̍ prAṇApAnau||50 (svadhiti̍ - ścaivA - cCinnO̍ - havyEnE - ṣyEtyAha̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam paśum|AlaByEtyA̱ - laBya|purOḍAśa̱m|niriti̍|vapati|samE̍dhamiti̍ sa - mEdham|Eva|Enam|Eti|laBatE|vapayA̱|pracaryEti̍# pra-carya|purOḍAśE̍na|prEti̍|carati|Urk|vai|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|Urja̱m|Eva|paśUnAm|maddhyataḥ|dadhAti|athO̍ iti|paśOḥ|Eva|Cidram|apIti̍|dadhAti|pRuṣadAjyasyEti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyasya|upahatyEtyu̍pa̍ - hatya|triḥ|pRucCati|śRutam|havI(3)ḥ|śamitaḥ|iti̍|triṣa̍tyA̍ iti tri - satyAḥ|hi|dEvAḥ|yaḥ|aśRutam|śRutam|Aha̍|saḥ|Ena̍sA|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|vai|Etau|paśUnAM|51 (50)
verses.samhita: paśumAlaBya# purOḍAśaM nirvapati̍ samEdhamEvainamA̍ laBatE̍ vapayA̱ pracarya# purOḍAśEna̍ pra caratyUrgvai̍ purOḍAśa̍ UrjamEva̍ paśUnAM̍ maddhyatO̍ dadhAtyathO̍# paśOrEva Cidramapi# dadhAti pRuṣadAjyasyOpahatya̍ triḥ pRucCati̍ śRutaṃ havI(3)ḥ śamitariti̍ triṣatyA̍ hi dEvA yO&śRutaṃ̍ śRutamAha sa EnasA̍ prAṇApAnau vA Etau paśUnAM-̍ [ ] 51

verses.padam: - Padam yat|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|paśOḥ|Kalu|vai|Ala̍bdhasyEtyA̍ - labdhasya|hRudayam|AtmA|aBi|samiti̍|Eti|yat|pRuṣadAjyEnEti̍# pRuṣat - AjyEna|hRuda̍yam|aBiGArayatItya̍Bi̍ - GArayati|Atmann|Eva|paśUnAm|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|dadhAti|paśunA̱|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tE|amanyanta|manuṣyA̱ḥ|naḥ|anvABaviṣyantItya̍nu-ABa̍viṣyanti|iti̍|tasya̍|śira̍ḥ|CittvA|mEdha̱m|prEti̍|akṣArayann|saḥ|prakṣaḥ|aBavat|tat|prakṣasya̍|prakṣatvamiti̍# prakṣa - tvam|yat|plakṣaśAKEti# plakṣa - śAKA|uttarabarqḥirityuttara̍ - baraḥiḥ|Bavati|samE̍dhasyEti̍ sa - mEdhasya|Eva|52 (50)
verses.samhita: ~Myat pRuṣadAjyaM̍ paśOḥ Kalu vA Alabdhasya̍ hRudayamAtmA&Bi̍ samEti̍ yat pRuṣadAjyEna̍ hRudaya-maBiGAraya̍tyAtmannEva̍ paśUnAM̍ prAṇApAnau̍ dadhAti̍ paśunA vai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tE&manyanta̍ manuṣyA# nO&nvABaviṣyantIti̍ tasya śiraḥ̍ CittvA mEdhaM prAkṣArayanthsa̍ prakṣO&Bavat̍ tat prakṣasya# prakṣatvaM ~Myat plakṣaśAKO-tta̍rabarqḥi-rBava̍ti̍ samEdhasyaiva-̍ [ ] 52

verses.padam: - Padam paśOḥ|avEti|dyati|paśum|vai|hriyamA̍ṇam|rakṣAṃ̍si|anviti̍|sacantE|antarA|yUpa̱m|ca|AhavanIyamityA̱̍ - havanIya̱m|ca|harati|rakṣasAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|paśOḥ|vai|AlabdhasyEtyA̍ - labdhasya|manaḥ|apEti̍|krAmati|manOtA̍yai|haviṣa̍ḥ|avadIyamA̍nasyEtya̍va̍ - dIyamAnasya|anviti̍|brUhi|iti̍|Aha|mana̍ḥ|Eva|asya|avEti̍|rundhE|EkA̍daśa|avadAnAnItya̍va̍ - dAnAni|avEti̍|dyati|daśa̍|vai|paśOḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|AtmA|EkAdaśaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|paśuḥ|tasya̍|avEti̍|53̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśOrava# dyati paśuM ~Mvai hriyamAṇaṃq̍ rakṣAṅqsyanu# sacantE&ntarA yUpaM̍ cA&&*havanIyaM̍ ca harati rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ paśOrvA Alabdhasya̍ manO&pa# krAmati manOtAyai̍ haviṣO&vadIyamA̍nasyAnu̍# brUhItyAha̍ mana# EvAsyAva# rundha EkAdaśAvadAnAnyava̍# dyati daśa vai paśOḥ prAṇA AtmaikAdaśO̍ yAvAnEva̍ paśustasyAva-̍ [ ] 53

verses.padam: - Padam dyati|hRudayasya|agrE̱|avEti̍|dyati|atha̍|jihvAyA̱ḥ|atha̍|vakṣa̍saḥ|yat|vai|hRuda̍yEna|aBigacCatItya̍Bi̍ - gacCati|tat|jihvayA̱|vadati|yat|jihvayA̱|vada̍ti|tat|ura̍saḥ|adhi̍|niriti̍|vadati|Etat|vai|paśOḥ|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|yasya|Evam|avadAyEtya̍va̍ - dAya|yathAkAmamiti̍# yathA - kAma̱m|uttarEṣAmityut̍ - tarEṣAm|avadyatItyava̍ - dyati|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|Eva|asya|paśOḥ|avattam|Bavati|maddhyataḥ|gudasya̍|avEti̍|dyati|maddhyataḥ|hi|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|uttamasyEtyut̍ - tamasya|avEti̍|dyati|54̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dyati hRudayasyAgrE&va̍# dyatyatha# jihvAyA atha vakṣasO̍ yadvai hRudayEnABigacCa̍ti̍ tajjihvayA# vadati yajjihvayA vadati̍ tadurasO&dhi nirvadatyEtadvai̍ paśOryathApUrvaM̍ ~MyasyaivamavadAya̍# yathAkAma-muttarEṣAmavadyati̍# yathA pUrvamEvAsya# paśOravattaM̍ Bavati maddhyatO gudasyAva# dyati maddhyatO hi prAṇa uttamasyAva̍# dyatyu- [ ] 54

verses.padam: - Padam uttama ityut̍ - tamaḥ|hi|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|yadi|ita̍ram|yadi̍|ita̍ram|uBaya̱m|Eva|ajA̍mi|jAya̍mAnaḥ|vai|brAhmaṇaḥ|triBiriti̍# tri - Biḥ|RuṇavEtyRuṇa̍ - vA|jAyatE|brahmacaryEṇEti# brahma - caryEṇa|Ruṣi̍Bya̍ ityRuṣi# - Byaḥ|yajñEna|dEvEBya̍ḥ|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|pitRuBya iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|Eṣaḥ|vai|anRuṇaḥ|yaḥ|putrI|yajvA̱|brahmacArivAsIti# brahmacAri - vAsI|tat|avadAnairityava̍ - dAnai̱ḥ|Eva|avEti|dayatE|tat|avadAnA̍nAmitya̍va̍ - dAnAnAm|avadAnatvamitya̍vadAna̍ - tvam|dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|dEvAḥ|agnim|abruvann|tvayA̱|vIrEṇa|asu̍rAn|aBIti̍|BavAma|iti̍|55̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ttamO hi prAṇO yadItaraM̍ ~MyadItara-muBaya̍mEvAjA̍mi̍ jAyamAnO̍ vai brA̱hmaṇastriBiṛRuṇavA̍ jAyatE̍ brahmacaryEṇarṣiByO̍ yajñEna# dEvEByaḥ̍ prajayA# pitRuBya# Eṣa vA anRuṇO̍ yaḥ putrI yajvA̱ brahmacArivAsI tadavadAnai̍rEvAva̍# dayata tadavadAnA̍nA-mavadAnatvaM̍ dEvAsurAḥ̍ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE dEvA agnimabruvan̍ tvayA# vIrEṇAsurAnaBi̍ BavAmEti-̍ [ ] 55

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|paśOḥ|uddhAramityut̍ - hAram|uditi|harai|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|uddhAramityu̍t̍ - hAram|uditi|aharata|dOḥ|pUrvAd^^rdhasyEti̍# pUrva - ad^^rdhasya|gudam|maddhyataḥ|śrOṇi̱m|jaGanAd^^rdhasyEti̍# jaGana-ad^^rdhasya|tata̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yat|trya~ggAṇAmiti̍# tri - a~ggAnA̱m|samavadyatIti# saM - avadyati|BrAtRu̍vyABiBUtyA̍ iti BrAtRuvya-aBiBUtyai|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|asya|BrAtRu̍vyaḥ|Bavati|akṣṇayA|avEti̍|dyati|tasmA̱t|akṣṇayA|paśava̍ḥ|a~ggA̍ni|prEti̍|haranti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||56 (45) (Etau paśUnAṃ̍ - samEdhasyaiva̍ - tasyA&vO̱ - ttamasyAva# dyatI - ti - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai paśOruddhAramuddha̍rA̍ iti sa EtamuddhAramuda̍harata̍ dOḥ pU̱rvArddhasya# gudaM maddhyataḥ̍ śrOṇiM̍ jaGanArddhasya tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yat trya~ggAṇAṃ# samavadyati BrAtRuvyABiBUtyai̍ BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ BavatyakṣṇayA&va# dyati tasmAdakṣṇayA̍ paśavO&~ggAni̍ pra haranti̍ pratiṣṭhityai||56̍ (Etau paśUnAṃ̍ - samEdhasyaiva̍ - tasyA&vO̱ - ttamasyAva# dyatI - ti - pa~jcacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mEdasA|srucau̱|prEti̍|UrṇOti|mEdO̍rUpA̍ iti mEdaḥ̍ - rUpAḥ|vai|paśavaḥ|rUpam|Eva|paśuṣu̍|dadhAti|yUṣann|avadhAyEtya̍va-dhAya̍|prEti̍|UrṇOti|rasa̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|paśUnAm|yat|yUḥ|rasa̱m|Eva|paśuṣu̍|dadhAti|pArśvEna̍|vasAhOmamiti̍# vasA - hOmam|prEti|yauti|maddhya̱m|vai|Etat|paśUnAm|yat|pArśvam|rasa̍ḥ|Eṣaḥ|paśUnAm|yat|vasA̱|yat|pArśvEna̍|vasAhOmamiti̍# vasA - hOmam|prayautIti# pra - yauti|maddhyataḥ|Eva|paśUnAm|rasa̱m|dadhAti|Gnanti̍|57̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mEdasA̍ srucau prOrṇOti̍ mEdOrUpA̍ vai paśavO# rUpamEva paśuṣu# dadhAti yUṣannavadhAya̍ prOrṇOti̍ rasO vA Eṣa paśUnAM̍ ~MyadyU rasamEva̍ paśuṣu# dadhAti pArśvEna# vasAhOmaM prayauti̍ maddhyaM ~MvA Etat paśUnAM̍ ~Myat pArśvaṃ rasa# Eṣa paśUnAM̍ ~MyadvasA yat pArśvEna# vasAhOmaM prayauti# maddhyata Eva paśUnAṃ̍ rasaM̍ dadhAti Gnanti- [ ] 57

verses.padam: - Padam vai|Etat|paśum|yat|sajñaMqpayantIti# saM - jñapayanti|aindraḥ|Kalu̍|vai|dEvata̍yA|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|aindraḥ|apAna ityapa̍ -anaḥ|aindraḥ|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|a~ggEa~gga̍ itya~ggE̱ - a~ggE|nIti|dEddhyat|iti̍|Aha|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|dEva̍|tvaṣṭaḥ|BUri̍|tE|saṃsamiti̍ saM-sam|Etu|iti|Aha|tvAṣṭrAḥ|hi|dEvata̍yA|paśava̍ḥ|viṣu̍rUpA̍ iti viṣu# - rUpAḥ|yat|salakṣmAṇa̍ iti sa-lakṣmAṇaḥ|Bavatha|iti̍|Aha|viṣu̍rUpA̍ iti viṣu-rUpAḥ|hi|EtE|santa̍ḥ|sala̍kṣmAṇa̍ iti sa - lakṣmAṇaḥ|Etaṛhi|Bava̍nti|dEvatrEti̍# dEva - trA|yanta̱m|58 (50)
verses.samhita: vA Etat paśuM ~Myath sa̱jñaMqpayantyaindraḥ̍ Kalu vai dEvatayA̍ prAṇa aindrO&pAna̍ aindraḥ prAṇO a~ggEa~ggE̍ ni dE̱ddhyadityAha̍ prAṇApAnAvEva paśuṣu# dadhAti dEva# tvaṣṭarBUri# tE saṃ samEtvityA̍ha̍ tvAṣṭrA hi dEvatayA̍ paśavO viṣurUpA̍ yath salakṣmAṇO̍ BavathEtyAha̍ viṣurUpA̍ hyEtE̍ santaḥ salakṣmAṇa̍ Etaṛhi Bavanti̍ dEvatrA yanta- [ ] 58

verses.padam: - Padam avasE|saKA̍yaḥ|anviti̍|tvA|mAtA|pitara̍ḥ|madantu|iti̍|Aha|anu̍matamityanu̍# - matam|Eva|Enam|mAtrA|pitrA|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|ad^^rdharca ityad^^rdha-RucE|vasAhOmamiti̍# vasA - hOmam|juhOti|asau|vai|ad^^rdharca ityad^^rdha-Rucaḥ|iyam|ad^^rdharca̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - Rucaḥ|imE iti|Eva|rasE̍na|anakti|diśa̍ḥ|juhOti|diśa̍ḥ|Eva|rasE̍na|anakti|athO̍ iti|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|Urja̱m|rasa̱m|avEti|rundhE|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|vai|Etau|paśUnAm|yat|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|vAnaspatyAḥ|Kalu|59̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mavasE̍ saKAyO&nu# tvA mAtA pitarO# madantvityAhA-numatamEvaina̍M̍ mAtrA pitrA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayatyarddharcE̍ vasAhOmaM̍ juhOtyasau̍ vA arddharca̍ iyamarddhaca̍ imE Eva rasEnAnakti̍ diśO# juhOti diśa# Eva rasEnAnaktyathO̍# digBya EvOrjaṃq rasamava# rundhE prAṇApAnau vA Etau paśUnAM̍ ~Myat pRuṣadAjyaM̍ ~MvAnaspatyAḥ̍ Kalu- [ ] 59

verses.padam: - Padam vai|dEvatayA|paśava̍ḥ|yat|pRuṣadAjyasyEti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyasya|upahatyEtyu̍pa̍ - hatya|Aha̍|vanaspata̍yE|anviti̍|brUhi|vanaspata̍yE|prEti̍|iṣya|iti̍|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|anyasyA̱nyasyEtyanyasya̍# - anyasya|samavattamiti# saM - avattam|samavadyatIti̍# saM-avadyati|tasmA̱t|nAnA̍rUpA̍ iti nAnA̱-rUpAḥ|paśavaḥ|yUṣṇA|upEti̍|si~jcati|rasa̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|paśUnAm|yat|yUḥ|rasa̱m|Eva|paśuṣu̍|dadhAti|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|hvayatE|paśava̍ḥ|vai|iḍA̱|paśUn|Eva|upEti̍|hvayatE|catuḥ|upEti̍|hvayatE|60̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vai dEvatayA̍ paśavO yat pRuṣadAjyasyO̍-pahatyA&&*ha̍ vanaspatayE&nu# brUhi vanaspatayE̍ prEṣyEti# prAṇApAnAvEva paśuṣu# dadhAtyanyasyA̱nyasya samavattaṃ samavadyati̍ tasmAnnAnArUpAḥ̍ paśavO# yUṣṇOpa# si~jcati rasO vA Eṣa paśUnAM̍ ~MyadyU rasamEva̍ paśuṣu# dadhAtIḍAmupa# hvayatE paśavO vA iḍA# paśUnEvOpa# hvayatE caturupa# hvayatE- [ ] 60

verses.padam: - Padam catuṣpAda̍ iti catuḥ̍ - pAdaḥ|hi|paśavaḥ|yam|kAmayE̍ta|apaśuḥ|syAt|iti̍|amEdaskamitya̍mEdaḥ-kam|tasmai̱|Eti̍|daddhyAt|mEdO̍rUpA̍ iti mEdaḥ-rUpAḥ|vai|paśava̍ḥ|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|Enam|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu-Byaḥ|niriti|Bajati|apaśuḥ|Eva|Bavati|yam|kAmayE̍ta|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|syAt|iti|mEda̍svat|tasmai̱|Eti̍|daddhyAt|mEdO̍rUpA̍ iti mEdaḥ̍ - rUpAḥ|vai|paśavaḥ|rUpEṇa̍|Eva|asmai|paśUn|avEti̍|rundhE|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|yajñam|asRujata|saḥ|Ajya̱M|61 (50)
verses.samhita: catuṣpAdO̍ hi paśavO yaM kAmayEtA̍ paśuḥ syAdityamEdaskaM̍ tasmA A daddhyAnmEdO̍rUpA̍ vai paśavO# rUpEṇaivainaM̍ paśuByO nirBajatyapaśurEva̍ Bavati̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ paśumAnth syAditi mEdasvat̍ tasmA A daddhyAnmEdO̍rUpA̍ vai paśavO# rUpEṇaivAsmai# paśUnava# rundhE paśumAnEva Bavati̍ prajApatiryajñama̍sRujata̍ sa AjyaM-̍ [ ] 61

verses.padam: - Padam purastA̱t|asRujata|paśum|maddhyataḥ|pRuṣadAjyamiti# pRuṣat - Ajyam|paścAt|tasmA̱t|AjyEna|prayAjA̍ iti# pra - yAjAḥ|ijyantE|paśunA̱|maddhyataḥ|pRuṣadAjyEnEti# pRuṣat - AjyEna|anUyAjA̍ ityanu̍ - yAjAḥ|tasmA̱t|Etat|miśram|iva|paścAthsRuṣṭamiti# paścAt - sRuṣṭam|hi|EkAdaśa|anUyAjAnitya̍nu̍ - yAjAn|yajati|daśa|vai|paśOḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|AtmA|EkAdaśaḥ|yAvAn|Eva|paśuḥ|tam|anviti̍|yajati|Gnanti̍|vai|Etat|paśum|yat|sajñaMqpayantIti̍# saM - jñapayanti|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Kalu|vai|Etau|paśUnAm|yat|pRuṣadAjyamiti̍# pRuṣat - Ajyam|yat|pRuṣadAjyEnEti# pRuṣat - AjyEna# ( )|anUyAjAnityanu̍ - yAjAn|yajati|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti||62̍ (56) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (cAtvAlAth̍ - suvargAya yad vaisarjanAni̍# - vaiṣṇavyarcA - pRuthivyai̍ - sAdhyA - iṣE tvE - tyagninA - paryagni̍ - paśOḥ - paśumAlaBya - mEdasA̍ srucA - vEkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (cAtvAlAd̍ - dEvAnupaiti# - mu~jcati - prahriyamAṇAya̍ - paryagni̍ - paśumAlaBya - catuṣpAdO̍ - dviṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam Of 6th Kandam (cAtvAlAt̍ - paśuṣu# dadhAti)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: purastAdasRujata̍ paśuM maddhyataḥ̍ pRuṣadAjyaM̍ paścAt tasmAdAjyEna̍ prayAjA ijyantE̍ paśunA# maddhyataḥ pRuṣadAjyEnA̍-nUyAjA-stasmA̍dEtanmiśrami̍va̍ paścAth sRuṣṭaṅ hyEkAdaśAnUyAjAn.̍ yajati̍ daśa vai paśOḥ prAṇA AtmaikAdaśO̍ yAvAnEva̍ paśustamanu# yajati Gnanti vA Etat paśuM ~Myath sa̱jñaMqpayanti̍ prAṇApAnau Kalu vA Etau paśUnAM̍ ~Myat pRuṣadAjyaM̍ ~Myat pRuṣadAjyEnA̍# ( ) nUyAjAn. yajati̍ prAṇApAnAvEva paśuṣu# dadhAti||62 praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (cAtvAlAth̍ - suvargAya yad vaisarjanAni̍# - vaiṣṇavyarcA - pRuthivyai̍ - sAdhyA - iṣE tvE - tyagninA - paryagni̍ - paśOḥ - paśumAlaBya - mEdasA̍ srucA - vEkAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (cAtvAlAd̍ - dEvAnupaiti# - mu~jcati - prahriyamAṇAya̍ - paryagni̍ - paśumAlaBya - catuṣpAdO̍ - dviṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ first and last padam of third praśnam of 6th KAṇḍam (cAtvAlAt̍ - paśuṣu# dadhAti)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 6.4 ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ - sOmamantrabrAhmaṇanirUpaṇaM
